name: Target Unknown
description:
1969, The Cold War at its finest! Two war leaders take control of one nuclear warhead. They have only one controller though, and guess what: the situation is quite OUT OF CONTROOOOL! It's either USSR or USA to win this battle, it's up to you to decide!

The doomsday clock is ticking.

CONTROLS:

[USSR]:
d - right
a - left
Space - boost

[USA]
arrows - right and left
Right CTRL - boost
